segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a moment of everyday life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in a glimpse of the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and a path look inviting in the daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running, no drain working properly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman dries her dish, foot in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so calm, totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's adventure on the stool catches my eye next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stretching for the cookie jar, plate in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool wobbles, threatening to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl participates, palm up for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mischief could end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water everywhere adds to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope this scene resolves without incident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast is striking between calm and chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
